resources.string:
Aries

March 21 to April 19
LUCKY NUMBER:7-17-21
Element: Fire
Color:Bright Red
Lucky Day Tuesday

Choose lucky number 7, 11 , 12 For making Business: Scorpio, Libra, and Taurus. For finding Love: Leo, Sagittarius

Taurus

April 20 to May 20
LUCKY NUMBER:4-6-11
Element: Earth
Color:Leaf Green

Choose lucky number 4,6,11 For making business: Gemini, Libra, Scorpio, and Sagittarius. for finding love: Virgo, Capricorn.

Gemini

May 21 to June 20
LUCKY NUMBER:3-12-18
Element:Air
Color:lemon green, orange

Choose lucky number 3,12,18 For making business: Cancer, Scorpio, Sagittarius, and Capricorn. To find love: Libra, Pisces.

Cancer

July 20 – Aug 10
LUCKY NUMBER:2-8-12
Element: Water
Color:White,Silver

Choose lucky number 2,8,12 For making business: Leo, Taurus, Capricorn, Aquarius. For finding love: Scorpio and Taurus.

LEO

Aug 10 – Sept 16
LUCKY NUMBER:1-9-10
Element: Fire
Color: Green

Choose lucky number 1-9-10 For making business: Virgo, Capricorn, Aquarius, Taurus. To find love: Aries and Sagittarius

Virgo

August 23 - September 22
LUCKY NUMBER:1-15-27
Element: Air
Color: Green

Choose lucky number 1-15-27 For making business: Libra, Gemini, Pisces, Taurus. To find love: Pisces, Cancer

LIBRA

September 23 - October 22
LUCKY NUMBER:2-8-19
Element: Earth
Color: Green

Choose Lucky numbers 2-8-19 For making business: Pisces, Taurus, and Gemini. To find love: Aquarius and Leo

Scorpio

October 23 - November 21
LUCKY NUMBER:4-8-21
Element: Water
Color: Violet, Purple

Choose Lucky numbers 4-8-21 For making business: Sagittarius – Aries – Taurus – Gemini To find love: Pisces and cancer.

Sagittarius

November 22 - December 21
LUCKY NUMBER:3-6-25
Element: Fire
Color:Black,Gray

Choose Lucky numbers 3-6-25 For making business: Cancer, Scorpio, Libra, Virgo, Leo To find love: Cancer, Scorpio.

Capricorn

December 22 - January 19
LUCKY NUMBER:9-14-1
Element: Earth
Color:Gray,Green

Choose Lucky numbers 9-14-1 For making business: Cancer, Scorpio, Libra, Virgo, Leo To find love: Cancer, Scorpio.

Aquarius

January 20 - February 18
LUCKY NUMBER:7-9-20
Element: Air
Color:Light blue,violet

Choose Lucky numbers 7-9-20 For making business: Pisces, Cancer, Leo, and Scorpio. To find love: Leo, Libra, Pisces

Taurus

February 19 - March 20
LUCKY NUMBER:5-11-19
Element:Water
Color:Navy blue, Sea green

Choose Lucky numbers 5-11-19 For making business: Aries, Libra, and Virgo. To find love: Leo, Aries, and Taurus
